glsa.title: cups-filters: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cups-filters, worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: cups-filters is an OpenPrinting CUPS Filters.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cups-filters. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for more details about the vulnerabilities.

impact.p: A remote attacker(s) could possibly execute arbitrary code utilizing multiple attack vectors, or a local attacker could gain escalated privileges via a specially crafted shared library.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All cups-filters users should upgrade to the latest version:
